SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夜[よる]に浮[う]かんでいた
SongLyrics.EngStr: Floating in the night

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 海月[くらげ]のような月[つき]が爆[は]ぜた
SongLyrics.EngStr: The moon like a sea moon exploded

SongLyrics.JpnStr: バス停[てい]の背[せ]を覗[のぞ]けば
SongLyrics.EngStr: If you look over the back of the bus stop

SongLyrics.JpnStr: あの夏[なつ]の君[きみ]が頭[あたま]にいる
SongLyrics.EngStr: You're in my head that summer

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 鳥居[とりい] 乾[かわ]いた雲[くも] 夏[なつ]の匂[にお]いが頬[ほほ]を撫[な]でる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Torii, dry clouds, the smell of summer caressing my cheeks.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 大人[おとな]になるまでほら、背伸[せの]びしたままで
SongLyrics.EngStr: Keep growing taller and taller until you grow up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 遊[あそ]び疲[つか]れたらバス停[てい]裏うらで空[そら]でも見[み]よう
SongLyrics.EngStr: When you're tired of playing, we can watch the sky behind the bus stop.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 直[じき]に夏[なつ]が暮[く]れても
SongLyrics.EngStr: Soon summer will be over

SongLyrics.JpnStr: きっときっと覚[おぼ]えてるから
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm sure you'll remember

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 追[お]いつけないまま大人[おとな]になって
SongLyrics.EngStr: Growing up without catching up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のポケットに夜[よる]が咲[さ]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: Night blooms in your pocket

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 口[くち]に出[だ]せないなら僕[ぼく]は一人[ひとり]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: If I can't say it out loud, I'm alone.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 其[それ]でいいからもう諦[あきら]めてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's all right. I've given up.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: だけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Only.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 夏日[なつび] 乾[かわ]いた雲[くも] 山桜桃[ゆすら]梅[うめ] 錆[さ]びた標識[ひょうしき]
SongLyrics.EngStr: Summer days, dry clouds, mountain cherry blossoms, plum blossoms, rusty signposts.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 記憶[きおく]の中[なか]はいつも夏[なつ]の匂[にお]いがする
SongLyrics.EngStr: In my memory, it always smells like summer.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 写真[しゃしん]なんて紙切[かみき]れだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Pictures are just pieces of paper.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 思[おも]い出[で]なんてただの塵[ごみ]だ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Memories are just dust.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それがわからないから、口[くち]を噤[つぐ]んだまま
SongLyrics.EngStr: I don't know that, so I keep my mouth shut

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 絶[た]えず君[きみ]のいこふ 記憶[きおく]に夏野[なつの]の石[いし]一[ひと]つ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Always in my memories, a single stone from the field of summer, where you used to go

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 俯[うつむ]いたまま大人[おとな]になって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I grew up with my head down

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 追[お]いつけない ただ君[きみ]に晴[は]れ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I can't catch up. It's just clear to you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 口[くち]に出[だ]せないまま坂[さか]を上[のぼ]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I went up the hill without being able to speak

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らの影[かげ]に夜[よる]が咲[さ]いていく
SongLyrics.EngStr: Night blooms in our shadows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 俯[うつむ]いたまま大人[おとな]になった
SongLyrics.EngStr: I grew up with my head down

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]が思[おも]うまま手[て]を叩[たた]け
SongLyrics.EngStr: Clap your hands as you see fit.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 陽[ひ]の落[お]ちる坂道[さかみち]を上[のぼ]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: Up the hill where the sun goes down

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]らの影[かげ]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: Our shadows

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 追[お]いつけないまま大人[おとな]になって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I grew up without being able to catch up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]のポケットに夜[よる]が咲[さ]く
SongLyrics.EngStr: Night blooms in your pocket

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 口[くち]に出[だ]せなくても僕[ぼく]ら一[ひと]つだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: We're one, even if we can't say it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 其[そ]れでいいだろ、もう
SongLyrics.EngStr: That's it. That's it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]の想[おも]い出[で]を噛[か]み締[し]めてるだけ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'm just chewing on your memories.

ListVocab: 遊び疲れる-あそびつかれたら
バス停裏-ばすていうら
追いつく-おいつけない
君のポケット-きみのぽけっと
口に出せない-くちにだせない
山桜桃梅-やまざくらももうめ
